Title: Episode Six
Plot: As part of their community service, the gang have to look after a group of terminally ill patients. However, one of the patients seems intent on cheating death. A mysterious gypsy casts a spell on Alex after he refuses to help a damsel in distress, and Rudy's alter ego takes another step closer to finding the missing superhero depicted on the woolly jumper.
ParentalRatingReason: Contains violence, sexual violence, drug use, offensive language and sex scenes
